value.title: Canada vows to be next country to go after Facebook to pay for news
value.excerpt: Canada vowed on Thursday to make Facebook Inc pay for news content, seeking allies in the media battle with tech giants and pledging not to back down if the social media platform shuts off the country's news as it did in Australia.

value.title: DeepMind researchers say AI poses a threat to people who identify as queer
value.excerpt: Researchers say the impact of AI on people who identify as queer is underexplored, which poses a threat to their health and privacy.

value.title: Chip mavens of the ISSCC gather virtually for AI, quantum, 5G
value.excerpt: The International Solid State Circuits Conference, an annual gathering of chip designers that has been going on for sixty-eight years, resumed this year as a virtual event.

value.title: Using container images to run PyTorch models in AWS Lambda

value.title: How this company leveraged AI to become the Netflix of Finland

value.title: This Chinese Lab Is Aiming for Big AI Breakthroughs
value.excerpt: China produces as many artificial intelligence researchers as the US, but it lags in key fields like machine learning. The government hopes to make up ground.
